results.text: You recall a specific passage of regional folklore related to the topic at hand, providing you with some insight. For the next hour, you gain an expertise die on folklore checks related to the subject.
The long hours spent with your nose in a book are paying off. You have advantage on your next History check.
While some study specific periods of history, you study a little bit of everything. You gain an expertise die in a History skill specialty relevant to the topic for the next 24 hours.

You are a historian of material culture. You analyze the style of an image, carving, or object, determining its age, which time period it was created in, and exactly which culture would have created it.
You trace a person’s lineage back through time to find important connections. You uncover something important or potentially scandalous in the family tree of a person you are familiar with.
You’ve unearthed a special fact about the subject. You gain a piece of Key Knowledge related to the topic.
